title: How can we make urgot one of the cool kids
body: No one invites him to any party's

replies.body: How is Urgot not one of the cool kids? He's sexy as f*ck!
I've devoted 3 rune pages purely to this loveable crab, he has a place at my party.
Just stop playing him until he gets his promised rework.
I WISH THAT URGOT COULD BE LIKE THE COOL CHAMPS!!!!!!!
Well if he stopped leaking motor oil all over the carpet then maybe he might get invited back!
Oh no i'm sorry, i didn't meant to offend ... just tell him to wear an air freshener and he's welcome any time ... now i have to learn to play urgot out of guilt
